metadata.title: CVE-2021-42327 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: dp_link_settings_write indrivers/gpu/drm/amd/display/amdgpu_dm/amdgpu_dm_debugfs.c in the Linuxkernel through 5.14.14 allows a heap-based buffer overflow by an attackerwho can write a string to the AMD GPU display drivers debug filesystem.There are no checks on size within parse_write_buffer_into_params when ituses the size of copy_from_user to copy a userspace buffer into a 40-byteheap buffer.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
